Rulings.Base: 1. If you flip a monster that was Special Summoned from the Main Deck face-down, it is still considered to be Special Summoned but is not considered to be Special Summoned from the Deck.\n2. "Corridor of Agony" is not applied to monsters Special Summoned from the Extra Deck.\n3. "Corridor of Agony" is applied to monsters Special Summoned before and after its activation.

PSCT.Base: Monsters that were Special Summoned from the Main Deck cannot activate their effects, their effects are negated, and they cannot declare an attack, as long as they remain face-up on the field.
